name: Skilli World
description:
On Skilli World players answer True or False questions to win life changing money. Once a week Skilli gives away a huge amount of money in her Free to Play Daily Mastermind Tournaments!

Make sure to check out the Tournament Schedule in the app and on Instagram @SkilliWorld

Here on Skilli World, trivia tournaments take place on Caribbean-inspired floating islands in space. Tournaments vary depending on: (1.) Entry fee; (2.) The number of players in the tournament; and (3.) Prize.

Skilli also offers SkillUPs to players – these are second lives that can be used in a tournament when a player answers a question Incorrectly.

Visit: www.skilliworld.com for more information!

See what Skilli is saying on Twitter: @SkilliSays

Don’t forget to turn on notifications so you never miss a big game!

Love,
Skilli
